backend/main.mo: Defines core backend data types for users, products, orders, educational content, business credit, carts, partners, integrations, and B2B services with comparison utilities and storage mixin.
feature_evidence.json: Aggregates feature evidence entries mapping features to relevant source files, components, and test IDs with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend React components, pages, and hooks.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint defining metadata, SEO tags, icons, and root mount point for the frontend app.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest specifying app metadata, theming, icons, categories, and screenshots.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app router configuring all routes, query client, theme provider, and identity provider wrapper.
frontend/src/components/admin/assistant/: Admin tool to view, add, edit, delete, and toggle knowledge base entries for the assistant.
Admin view listing unanswered assistant questions and allowing conversion into knowledge base entries.
frontend/src/components/admin/Marketplac: Admin panel that loads and displays marketplace roadmap data with progress tracking and a manual refresh option.
frontend/src/components/admin/UserRoleMa: Admin interface for viewing users, filtering, and assigning roles through dialogs and update mutations.
frontend/src/components/assistant/Assist: User chat interface for interacting with the assistant, handling message flow, responses, and escalation prompts.
Floating assistant button that opens a chat panel containing the AssistantChatPanel component.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Global layout with header, footer, navigation, admin quick-access links, auth handling, and responsive mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/privacy/CookieCo: Displays a cookie consent banner with accept, reject, and privacy policy navigation options based on stored consent state.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Form for creating a user profile by submitting name and email using a mutation and displaying toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/security/HumanCh: Dialog requiring a checkbox and simple math question to verify the user before continuing.
frontend/src/components/startup/Activiti: Fetches and displays user startup activities with progress tracking and completion actions.
frontend/src/components/startup/Business: Shows business credit progress and allows updating verification and bureau registration statuses.
frontend/src/components/startup/ClassesL: Displays user lessons, progress, and allows selecting a lesson to view details.
frontend/src/components/startup/LessonDe: Renders detailed lesson view with video, content, and options to mark complete or go back.
frontend/src/components/startup/VirtualM: Displays a user's upcoming and past virtual meetings using data from a query hook, with cards for joining or viewing details.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAssistant.ts: Provides a mutation hook that sends questions to the backend assistant via the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook for managing authentication, identity loading, and login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains various React Query hooks for admin actions, user profiles, and backend operations, handling auth and query invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS styles, color variables, dark mode themes, and animated gradient text effects.
frontend/src/lib/cookieConsent.ts: Manages cookie consent status using localStorage with helpers to get, set, and check if consent should be shown.
frontend/src/lib/humanCheck.ts: Implements a session-based human verification flag with TTL-based expiration and helper functions.
frontend/src/lib/pricingCopy.ts: Provides centralized pricing details and marketing copy for the platform and store builder subscription.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin dashboard with tabbed sections for settings, user roles, knowledge base, unanswered questions, and roadmap, including Stripe setup and access control actions.
frontend/src/pages/AffiliateDashboardPag: Affiliate dashboard showing placeholder referral and commission stats, milestones, and login gating.
frontend/src/pages/AppCenterPage.tsx: App integrations manager allowing users to list, add, edit, and delete webhook‑based app integrations with dialog-driven forms.
frontend/src/pages/AppointmentDashboard5: Page embedding a Calendly scheduler and providing appointment booking info for the ANC Apprentice Program Center.
frontend/src/pages/B2BDashboard.tsx: B2B dashboard gated by membership, showing quick links and placeholder metrics for projects, clients, and revenue.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerBlog.tsx: Customer blog listing static posts with categories, excerpts, dates, and navigation to full articles.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerBlogPost.tsx: Displays a full blog post based on the postId URL param, rendering predefined content and a back button.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerFAQ.tsx: Shows a list of customer FAQs using an accordion, including pricing info pulled from PRICING_MODEL.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerFavoritesPage: Fetches and displays the user's favorite sellers, with options to remove favorites and login gating.
Provides a placeholder messages inbox for customers, gated behind login, noting messaging is coming soon.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerProfileHome.t: Displays the customer profile dashboard with quick links to store, favorites, settings, and other features.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerPurchaseHisto: Shows a purchase history page placeholder for logged‑in users, indicating order tracking is coming soon.
Provides a settings dashboard with sections for profile, privacy, notifications, and account, mostly placeholders.
Displays the user's wishlist, handles login gating, loads saved item IDs, and allows removing items with feedback.
frontend/src/pages/FunnelsPage.tsx: Shows and manages marketing funnel partner configuration with admin controls, URL validation, and modal editing.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with hero content and feature cards linking to store-related pages.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailure.tsx: Shows a payment failure message with options to retry checkout or return home.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccess.tsx: Processes payment success via query params, updates subscription status, and redirects or shows errors.
frontend/src/pages/PciCompliancePage.tsx: Displays PCI compliance certificate info with preview, open-in-new-tab, and download options.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicyPage.tsx: Renders a scrollable privacy policy page with sections on data collection, usage, and disclosure. Uses UI components to structure headings, text, and separators.
frontend/src/pages/SellersBusinessesBlog: Displays a grid of blog posts for sellers and businesses with categories, read times, and navigation links. Uses cards and badges to present post summaries.
Shows a full blog post based on the URL parameter, pulling content from a predefined posts object. Includes navigation back and metadata like date, category, and read time.
Provides an accordion-style FAQ page covering B2B services, startup program features, integrations, and payments. Uses UI components to organize questions and answers.
frontend/src/pages/StartupDashboard.tsx: Displays the startup program dashboard with progress metrics and tabs for lessons, meetings, activities, and credit building, gated by membership and login checks.
frontend/src/pages/StoreBuilderPage.tsx: Implements the store builder UI, handling template selection, branding customization, subscription flow, and saving configuration via query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/StorePage.tsx: Displays available products, manages checkout sessions with human verification, and handles authenticated purchasing.
frontend/src/types/index.ts: Defines shared frontend TypeScript types for users, products, orders, services, store templates, branding, and related domain models.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend styling system.
project_state.json: Describes current project metadata, implemented features, and roadmap state for development tracking.
